column4: Hi All, I have a problem with my sound card, may I ask some questions?

that should be compaticble with te via82cxxx driver...
how can i know if proper modules are loaded?
i do everything by terminal, sorry for the confusion

Now i hear a backround noise but if i start vlc it says  oss audio output error: cannot open audio device (/dev/dsp)
you need to switch your output plugin to alsa it sounds like
